project_abstract.cdata: The Mehardeh Power Project includes: (i) construction of the first 125-MW stage of a steam-electric power station at Mehardeh; (ii) construction of four new 230-kV substations and expansion of four existing substations; (iii) training for EPE staff in management and engineering; and (iv) engineering and management consulting services.
